title: Tiger King: Ex-park employee spills horrors from inside Joe Exotic's zoo.
itunes:title: Tiger King: Ex-park employee spills horrors from inside Joe Exotic's zoo.
description:
Listen as former Joe Exotic employee Gaylynn Eastwood tells Nancy Grace that park employees knew that animals were being killed. She also says she was aware that fraud was a regular occurrence. According to Eastwood, Joe Exotic is exactly where he needs to be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
